channel.title: Compile
channel.description:
Ok so im back to coding and i got a new PC and its a window's 7. i got jdk7 and its in my program files (86) how would my code be for it???? here what it is....
[code]@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files(86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_29\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause[/code]
can anyone help me out???

item.title: Compile
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

RandQm:

you code for what, what base are you using, what are you trying to run, client; source?

Doesn’t seem to be a problem of what base, from what I can see, this is where the problem is…

Make it Program Files (x86), like so.

Read full topic
